thread.title: BRIEF-Just Water International Posts HY Total Comprehensive Income NZ$1 Mln ‍

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Just Water International Posts HY Total Comprehensive Income NZ$1 Mln ‍

organizations.name: brief-just water international posts hy total comprehensive income nz$

text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Just Water International Ltd:
* ‍CURRENT INDICATIONS SHOW FINAL DIVIDEND IS LIKELY TO BE 2.2 CENTS PER SHARE​
* HY TOTAL OPERATING REVENUE NZ$8.5 MILLION, UP 6.6 PERCENT ‍​
* HY TOTAL COMPREHENSIVE INCOME NZ$1 MILLION VERSUS NZ$866,000 ‍​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
